about.title: Who the program is for
about.subtitleRight: The program might not suit you if:
left: You strive for success. Our programs are designed with market demands in mind, helping you build the skills needed to achieve your dream career.
You value practical experience. Instead of dry theory, we focus on real-world projects you can add to your portfolio.
You are open to continuous learning and growth. In IT, adaptability is crucial, and with us, you'll stay updated on the latest technologies.
right: You are not ready to dedicate time to learning. Gaining new knowledge requires time and energy, and success depends largely on your commitment.
You are not interested in applying practical skills. Our programs are designed for those willing to tackle real-world challenges and actively use their knowledge.
You are looking for ready-made solutions. In IT, problem-solving and adaptability are key; StartIT.uz is for those ready to grow and develop.

slides.name: Nargiza
slides.text: Here, I’m receiving quality education at an affordable price.

slides.name: Gulnora
slides.text: I have had consultations with two mentors about building a career in IT. They provided detailed answers to my questions and shared valuable resources.

slides.name: Sherzod
slides.text: I like how the courses are designed to integrate practical applications.

slides.name: Saodat
slides.text: The platform allows me to learn at my own pace and at times that are convenient for me.

questions.question: I’m new to IT. Are the courses on this platform suitable for me?
questions.text: The platform offers courses at various levels. Each course page specifies the knowledge and skills required to enroll.

questions.question: Will I receive a certificate upon completing a course?
questions.text: Yes, absolutely. If you took a free course, you can purchase the certificate for that course. If you paid for the course, the certificate is provided at no extra cost.

questions.question: Who are the mentors, and what does booking a mentor mean?
questions.text: Mentors are experienced professionals who have been successfully working in various IT fields for several years. Booking a mentor means scheduling a time for an online consultation with them.

questions.question: What is an online consultation with a mentor?
questions.text: An online consultation with a mentor is a 30-minute virtual meeting held on the Zoom platform. During the session, you can get answers to your questions about IT education, choosing a specialization, building a career, developing IT projects, or managing them. There is no specific program for the consultation. To make the most of the opportunity, we recommend preparing your questions in advance.

questions.question: Do I need to create a Zoom account to book a mentor?
questions.text: No, registering on our platform is sufficient.

registrationConfirmation.title: Registration Confirmation
registrationConfirmation.text1: To complete your registration, please check your email and follow the link in the email to confirm your account.
registrationConfirmation.text2: If you don’t see the email, please check your "Spam" folder.
registrationConfirmation.text3: Once confirmed, you can log into your account or click the continue button to check the verification.
registrationConfirmation.errorMessage: This user has not been verified, please follow the instructions above!
